# Artist Paws - Codebase Guide

## Project Overview
A playful, English-language static website showcasing "guinea pig artists" (Laska & Plyushka) with their creative works. Built for GitHub Pages deployment using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with whimsical animations, interactive effects, and seasonal theming.

## Architecture & Structure

**Multi-page layout:**
- `index.html` - Main landing page with hero, artist cards, gallery, and purchase CTA
- `laska.html` / `plyushka.html` - Individual artist profile pages with detailed bios and galleries
- `style.css` - Global styles with CSS variables for theming
- `script.js` - Interactive behaviors, animations, and ThemeManager
- `themes.js` - Seasonal theme configuration (default autumn, Christmas/winter)
- `images/` - Local image assets organized in subdirectories

**Design Philosophy:**
- Playful, artistic theme with paw/paint emojis (üêæ üé® ‚ú®)
- Dynamic seasonal theming (warm autumn colors by default, cool winter colors for Christmas)
- Heavy use of CSS animations and transitions for whimsy
- Performance-first mobile optimization with reduced animations

## Directory Structure

```
/images
  /artists     - laska.jpg, plyushka.jpg (profile photos)
  /gallery     - (currently uses SVG placeholders)
  /ui          - logo.png (navigation logo)
index.html     - Main page (English)
laska.html     - Laska's profile (Chief Introvert Designer)
plyushka.html  - Plyushka's profile (Cheerful Art Director)
style.css      - Global styles with CSS custom properties
script.js      - Interactive features + ThemeManager
themes.js      - Seasonal theme configurations
```

## Seasonal Theming System

**Theme Configuration (`themes.js`):**
- **default (autumn)**: Warm browns (#6B4423, #8B4513), beiges (#E8D5C4, #D2B48C), gold (#FFD700)
- **christmas (winter)**: Cool blues (#4A5D7C, #6B8CAE), light blues (#E0F4FF, #C8E4F0), teal (#A8DADC)
- Automatic theme switching based on date (Dec 1 - Jan 15 = Christmas)
- Custom emojis per theme (default: üêæüé®‚ú®, christmas: ‚ùÑÔ∏è‚õÑüéÑ‚ú®üéÅ‚òÉÔ∏è)

**CSS Variables (`style.css`):**
- `:root` defines default theme colors
- `body[data-theme="christmas"]` overrides for winter theme
- All components use `var(--color-primary)` etc for dynamic theming

**ThemeManager (`script.js`):**
- Auto-detects season via `getCurrentSeason()` 
- Applies `data-theme` attribute to body
- Initializes season-specific effects (e.g., snowfall for Christmas)
- Updates cursor trail and floating element emojis

## CSS Conventions

**Animation Strategy:**
- Desktop: Rich animations (cursor trails, floating elements, parallax, snowfall)
- Mobile (`@media max-width: 768px`): Simplified animations (`animation-duration: 0.3s !important`)
- Use `will-change`, `transform3d`, `backface-visibility: hidden` for GPU acceleration
- Christmas theme adds `.snowflake` elements with `@keyframes snowfall`

**Responsive Breakpoints:**
- `768px` - Mobile/tablet transition (reduces animations, adjusts grid)
- `480px` - Small mobile (single-column layouts)
- `769px-1024px` - Tablet-specific optimizations

**Key Classes:**
- `.master-card` - Artist profile cards with hover lift/rotate effects
- `.gallery-item` - Image grid items with scale/rotate on hover
- `.buy-button` - Pulsing CTA with gradient background (uses theme colors)
- `.sticky-note` - Rotating note element on hero section
- `.snowflake` - Christmas theme snowflakes (auto-generated by ThemeManager)

## JavaScript Patterns

**Performance Optimizations:**
- All scroll handlers use `requestAnimationFrame` with `ticking` flag to throttle
- Touch device detection: `/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)`
- Cursor trail limited to `Math.random() > 0.8` to reduce DOM manipulation
- Snowfall only on desktop (`window.innerWidth > 768`)
- Lazy loading enabled on non-hero images (`loading="lazy"`)

**Interactive Features:**
- Smooth scroll to anchor links (`scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })`)
- Image lightbox viewer (click gallery images ‚Üí fullscreen overlay)
- IntersectionObserver for fade-in animations on scroll
- Touch event handlers for mobile tap feedback
- Seasonal cursor trail using `window.seasonalEmojis` array

**ThemeManager Class:**
- `getCurrentSeason()` - Returns 'christmas' or 'default' based on current date
- `applyTheme(themeName)` - Sets `data-theme` attribute and updates emojis
- `initSnowfall()` - Creates animated snowflakes for Christmas theme
- `createSnowflake()` - Generates individual snowflake elements

## Common Modifications

**Adding New Artist:**
1. Create `[name].html` from `laska.html` or `plyushka.html` template
2. Update colors in embedded `<style>` if needed
3. Add navigation links in all page headers
4. Add artist card to `index.html` `.masters-grid`
5. Add photo to `images/artists/[name].jpg`

**Image Management:**
- Profile photos: `images/artists/` (actual JPG files)
- Gallery placeholders: Currently SVG data URIs with gradients
- Logo: `images/ui/logo.png` (used in navigation)
- Replace placeholder SVGs with actual artwork by updating `src` attributes

**Adding New Seasonal Theme:**
1. Add theme object to `themes.js` with colors and emojis
2. Add `body[data-theme="newtheme"]` CSS variables in `style.css`
3. Update `getCurrentSeason()` logic in `themes.js`
4. Optional: Add theme-specific effects in `ThemeManager.init()`

**Animation Adjustments:**
- Global speed: Modify keyframe percentages in `style.css` animations
- Mobile: Change `animation-duration` value in `@media (max-width: 768px)` 
- Disable specific: Set `animation: none` on hover states
- Christmas snowfall: Adjust `snowflakeCount` and interval in `initSnowfall()`

## Testing & Deployment

**Local Development:**
```powershell
# Simple: Open index.html in browser (no build step)
# Or use Live Server extension for auto-reload
```

**GitHub Pages:**
- Deploys from `main`/`master` branch root directory
- No build process required (static files)
- Test locally before push - no server-side rendering
- Ensure `themes.js` loads before `script.js`

**Browser Compatibility:**
- Modern CSS (Grid, Flexbox, CSS Variables, custom cursors)
- IntersectionObserver API (IE11 not supported)
- Touch events for mobile Safari/Chrome
- Christmas theme requires CSS `@keyframes` and `data-theme` attribute support

## Content & Localization

**Language:**
- All content in English
- Maintain playful, whimsical tone ("Art made by fluffy paws!")
- Character encoding: UTF-8 specified in all `<meta charset>`

**Artist Names:**
- **Laska** - Chief Introvert Designer (warm colors: reds, oranges, yellows)
- **Plyushka** - Cheerful Art Director (cool colors: blues, purples, pinks, greens)

**Custom Cursors:**
- Desktop: Seasonal emoji cursors (default: üêæ, Christmas: ‚ùÑÔ∏è)
- Interactive elements: Themed pointer (default: üé®, Christmas: ‚õÑ)
- Mobile: Disabled (`cursor: default !important`) for performance

**Performance Notes:**
- Preconnect to external resources (though currently using local images)
- Defer non-critical JS: `<script src="themes.js"></script><script src="script.js" defer></script>`
- Load order critical: themes.js before script.js for ThemeManager
- SVG placeholders are inline to avoid HTTP requests
